summary: Ever wanted to smith something, but unwilling to douse all of your perk points on it? Just Rent them today!
descriptionHtml:
For a nominal fee, the player can buy access to a smithing perk before they would normally have access to it. The costs are high, but so are the rewards.

for 4 minutes, the player has access to whatever perk they have contracted, not available all at once, nor from the same place.

Completed:
Steel / Advanced / Dwarven / elven / Glass / orcish / ebony


please note these will remove the perk after the 4 min, but you cant even use it if you already have the perk or if you dont have the cash

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

Location Spoilers
Steel is right next to War Bears
          400g
Advanced is in Skyforge
          650g
Dwarven is in Markarth
           1250g
glass in Shor\'s Stone
           3400g
elven in Northwatch keep [as recommended by Soutear]
           800g
Ebony in Gloombound Mine [as recommended by Soutear]
           4500g
orcish in Dushnik Yol
           2500g
Further Placement suggestions are welcome, as are price change sugg. and current place rearrangement as well.
author: chimeric929
